name: NyooMedia Business Solutions
tag_list: local, online, ecommerce, platform, service, marketplace, groupon
overview:
NyooMedia helps Local Businesses and Large Brands get Great Leads, Better Conversions and More Customers through Internet, Social Media and Mobile. The company provides an end-to-end solution from microsite creation and campaign delivery to intelligent dashboards and analysis through its Cloud-Based SaaS platform, http://Bizgain.in which caters to customers all over India and http://Bizgain.us which targets North America.

Bizgain essentially offers an Integrated Platform that can help local businesses and brands Create, Execute and Analyze Digital Marketing Campaigns. While the platform has a Self-Serve Capability, the company also has an in-house Professional Services Team that can Plan, Implement and Monitor these Campaigns for its clients. Apart from Platform and SEM, its also offers SEO, E-Newsletters, Blog Writing and Facebook / Twitter Page Management as part of the professional services.

The company also runs a city information portal called http://MetroMela.com which focuses on local listings, editorial and user reviews across Shopping, Food, Entertainment, Health & Wellness and Services. MetroMela has a presence across 12 cities in India.
